questions.question: My A1C level is 9.2, which indicates high blood sugar. What immediate steps can I take to lower it?
My LDL cholesterol is 160, which is high. What lifestyle changes can I make to reduce it?
My PSA level is 4.5, which is slightly elevated. What follow-up tests or procedures do you recommend?
My blood pressure is 140/90, which is high. What monitoring schedule do you recommend to track my progress?
